sense.def:
One's accomplishments
so tista opravila, ki jih nekdo dobro obvlada.

seg.quote: One of her few accomplishments was the ability to do cartwheels.

sense.def:
The accomplishment of a task or plan
pomeni, da sta naloga ali načrt opravljena;

seg.quote: The accomplishment of this task filled him with satisfaction.

sense.def:
An accomplishment
je nekaj izjemnega, kar je bilo narejeno ali doseženo.
